faqs.question: How quickly can I hire developers through NeuronHire?
faqs.answer: Most clients hire in less than 15 days. We provide pre-vetted candidates matching your requirements within this period.

faqs.question: Can I test candidates before hiring?
faqs.answer: Yes. You'll receive all our graded technical reports of each pre-vetted candidate, including live coding recordings and solution analyses.

faqs.question: What if a developer isn't a good fit after hiring?
faqs.answer: Our placements include a warranty period (defined in the SOW): if a hire departs within that window we will source a replacement per contract terms.

faqs.question: Do you support onboarding and integration?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide onboarding checklists, first-week touchpoints and optional cultural onboarding sessions to accelerate ramp-up.

faqs.question: How do you verify technical skills?
faqs.answer: We use practical exercises that can include algorithm tests and real-world projects. We also conduct peer technical interviews and reference checks to confirm real hands-on ability.

faqs.question: Can I customize your assessment criteria?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Share your rubric, and we'll adapt evaluations to mirror your team's standards.

faqs.question: Do you provide code samples from past projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, anonymized GitHub portfolios are available upon request.

faqs.question: Do you assess English and cultural fit?
faqs.answer: Yes! Every candidate goes through an English check and a behavioral interview focused on collaboration and timezone compatibility.

faqs.question: How is NeuronHire different from a normal recruiting agency?
faqs.answer: We combine deep technical vetting with a white-glove operational model: sourcing, hands-on technical checks, English & cultural screening, and contract/payroll support.

faqs.question: What tools do you offer for remote team management?
faqs.answer: Our dashboard includes time-tracking, performance analytics, and integrated communication tools.

faqs.question: How are contract extensions handled?
faqs.answer: We notify you 30 days before contract expiry and handle all renewal paperwork automatically.

faqs.question: Do you assist with project conflict resolution?
faqs.answer: Our HR specialists provide mediation within 24 hours of escalation.

faqs.question: Which engagement models do you support?
faqs.answer: We support direct contractor arrangements, EOR/payroll solutions via partners, or client-preferred models, chosen per engagement.

faqs.question: Who owns the IP of delivered work?
faqs.answer: IP and assignment terms are contractually defined in the SOW; we ensure client ownership can be implemented as required.

faqs.question: How do you protect confidential data and security?
faqs.answer: Contractors and NeuronHire sign NDAs and we follow secure handling practices; additional client security controls can be enforced on request.

faqs.question: How are your fees structured?
faqs.answer: Fees and payment terms are set in the SOW / Master Services Agreement; clients are invoiced per the agreed total for the engagement.

faqs.question: How quickly can I scale my team up/down?
faqs.answer: We can onboard new developers in 15days. Contract pauses require 15 days' notice.

faqs.question: Can you scale teams quickly for urgent needs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we keep a vetted pipeline and offer expedited sourcing and structured onboarding for high-priority projects.

faqs.question: How are payments, invoicing and taxes handled?
faqs.answer: We invoice clients per the SOW; tax obligations depend on the engagement model. We coordinate with clients and EOR partners to ensure compliance.
